title: Natural Person Specific
description: Specific data for natural person registration

statusNIF.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalNIFIndicatorCode. Only filled when residenceStatus is NRES (non-resident). If set to SIM, a NIF document must be provided in the document block

birthPlace.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCityCode. Required only if country is Brazil (BR). Required only if country is Brazil (BR)

nationality.$comment: Consult External code text table ExternalCountryCode

civilStatus.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalMaritalStatusCode

occupation.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalProfessionCode

simplifiedRegistrationForNonResident.description: Simplified registration for non-resident. Should only be filled when residence status = RESI
simplifiedRegistrationForNonResident.$comment: R4: foreignIntermediaryName is required when simplifiedRegistrationForNonResident = true

foreignIntermediaryName.description: Name of the foreign intermediary. Required if simplified registration for non-resident = true
